Job Description
2023 will potentially see Sandoz become a standalone organization! Already a global market leader in Generics and Biosimilar medicine, this is an exciting, once-in-a-career opportunity to set our own path forward as an independent, purpose-driven organization, and as the founders of a new Sandoz, this is a time of immense opportunity for us all, both professionally and personally!
Together we will shape the future of Sandoz... are you ready to make a difference?
Position Purpose:
Implements regulatory maintenance activities to achieve targets and business objectives in accordance with the submission plan to avoid stock-outs and delayed launches. Ensures that preparation of variations and second wave submissions follow established processes and timelines.
Key Responsibilities:
-Preparation of regulatory life cycle maintenance submissions - variations, renewals and second wave submissions, Modules 2 to 5 as per defined timelines.
-Evaluates proposed changes and provides on time regulatory input for worldwide regulatory impact.
-Contributes to performance and KPI's of the team to deliver agreed targets and objectives and supports reporting.
-On time response to HA commitments and deficiency letters.
-Ensures that the escalation process to next or higher-level management is followed, as applicable.
-Ensures the receipt of proper product transfers from DRCs, MRCs and BD Regulatory.
-Ensures proper data management and completion of all assigned trainings within specified timelines.
-Any other responsibility assigned after training (as applicable).
Diversity & Inclusion / EEO
We are committed to building an outstanding, inclusive work environment and diverse teams representative of the patients and communities we serve.
Minimum Requirements
• At least 2-4 years of proven experience in regulatory with an exposure of working in global organization in generics is preferred. Campus graduates with agility can be considered.
• Exposure towards project management is a plus.
• Well-structured, self-committed, resilient, flexible, team player.
• High operational excellence orientationJob Details
